name: deviantN0NNAKED v7 (rotane)
description: Gives comment boxes their borders back. Also styles artist descriptions and deviation sidebars in the same way. (Works on Group pages/backroom and Sta.sh too.) Full details, with bigger screenshot: http://rotane.deviantart.com/art/deviantN0NNAKED-v7-155706471 ATTENTION: If things look odd, you can grab the latest stable version, v1.8 here: Style 93797

user.name: rotane
user.about: I like to write userstyles. Some of them i upload here, the majority of which are for deviantART.com

additional_info:
Version history:
  • Update 0.3 (July 10, 2010) for v7 Final, includes naked artist's comments box.
  • Update 0.4 (July 14, 2010) includes naked artist's comments speechbubble arrow.
  • Update 0.4-1 (July 28, 2010) Fixes for deviation A/B testing.
  • Update 0.4-2 (August 29, 2010) Fixes for speechbubble arrow.
  • Update 0.4-3 (August 30, 2010) Fix for 0.4-2 fix.
  • Update 0.4-4 (September 17, 2010) Fix for new deviation testing pages (Group C).
  • Update 0.5 (December 2, 2010) Fix for deviation pages, again; and cake-badge-comments colourfix.
  • Update 0.6 (February 4, 2011) Fix for deviation pages: "nonnaked" buttons (download/print/etc).
  • Update 0.7 (May 1, 2011) Fix for new edit buttons on deviation pages (artist's comments).
  • Update 0.8 (July 14, 2011) Fix for new journals-as-deviations.
  • Update 0.8-1 (January 14, 2012) Bugfix for description box.
  • Update 0.9 (February 14, 2012) Support for Sta.sh pages.
  • Update 0.9-1 (April 21, 2012) Bugfix for description box; subtle gradient in outer commentboxes.
  • Update 1.0 (June 8, 2012) Description box by group account; overal updates.
  • Update 1.1 (July 21, 2012) Deviation/Journal sidebar area: inspired by new "Purchase" block.
  • Update 1.1-1 (August 31, 2012) "More Like This" and "Report deviation" sidebar buttons updates.
  • Update 1.2 (September 1, 2012) Sidebar button fixes; better compatibility with style 50823.
  • Update 1.3 (September 30, 2012) Support for Prints Integration on Deviation pages.
  • Update 1.4 (October 6, 2012) Support for Full View Descriptions in More Like This.
  • Update 1.4-1 (October 18, 2012) Bugfix for "Report Deviation" button.
  • Update 1.4-2 (October 27, 2012) All sidebar elements are now at full width; small update for Prints Integration on Deviation pages.
  • Update 1.5 (November 7, 2012) Vastly improved deviation/journal sidebar (at least code-wise.)
  • Update 1.5-1 (December 28, 2012) Bugfix for new Commission Box.
  • Update 1.5-2 (January 19, 2013) Quick fix for "inline MLT": http://fav.me/d5rmuqf
  • Update 1.5-3 (February 12, 2013) Bugfix for "inline MLT": There seems to be no header anymore.
  • Update 1.5-4 (March 12, 2013) Small fix to inline MLT; and it now hides the "Sell as print" bubble.
  • Update 1.5-5 (April 5, 2013) Easyreply boxes fixes; Redraw button styles.
  • Update 1.5-6 (April 9, 2013) Again a new version of inline-MLT.
  • Update 1.6 (April 18, 2013) New Share module; fix for "edit print" button.
  • Update 1.6-1 (April 20, 2013) Tweaked the New Share module to fit better with the other buttons.
  • Update 1.7 (July 1, 2013) Compatibility for Webkit browsers; oh so slight colour tweaks; smbutton fixes.
  • Update 1.8 (August 13, 2013) Support for Forum pages.
  • Update 2.0 Alpha 1 (October 8, 2013) Support for new deviation pages.
  • Update 2.0 (June 24, 2014) Removed -moz and -webkit prefixes.
  • Update 2.0.1 (June 25, 2014) Removed old fix for Forum pages.
  • Update 2.0.2 (October 21, 2014) Preliminary fix for tags in deviation descriptions; parent comment border-radius fix.
  • Update 2.0.3 (August 27, 2017) Better handling for tags in deviation descriptions.
